amendment.description: To extend the numerical limitation exception for H-2B nonimmigrants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3311 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3311 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S12913-12914; text: CR S12914) To extend the numerical limitation exception for H-2B nonimmigrants.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3311 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3311 proposed by Senator Mikulski.
